LanguageData.SaloonDoor_Westerado.label: saloon door
LanguageData.SaloonDoor_Westerado.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of. Can't hold a roof.
LanguageData.Palisade_Westerado.label: palisade
LanguageData.Palisade_Westerado.description: An impassable palisade. Incapable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.Palisade_Westerado_Blueprint.label: palisade (blueprint)
LanguageData.Palisade_Westerado_Frame.label: palisade (building)
LanguageData.Palisade_Westerado_Frame.description: An impassable palisade. Incapable of holding up a roof.
